page.title: 08Annual Events - Radley
page.content: New Year Dance run by Football Club. Palm Sunday procession of Church congregation behind a donkey through the village to church. Good Friday competitive walk to raise money for Derby & Joan Club. Summer Fayre Village School fund raiser held in May or June. Radley Soccer Festival for under 10 & 11 ages 6 a side soccer. Flower Show and Fete held on 2nd Saturday in July. Church Barbeque in vicarage garden in July. Sewing Group Summer party in early September. Harvest Supper in village hall in October. Carol singing in streets with house to house collection for Christmas Parcels for the needy, by the Church Choir, in December.
